identity.tone: Warm, Serious about Coffee, Premium, Sensory

headings.usage: Use for all major headings in the Widget and PDP. Adds the 'specialty coffee' character.

body.usage: Use for all body text, UI elements, and Admin dashboard data.

mono.usage: Use for technical details (roast dates, batch numbers) or small labels.

widget_theme.description: Dark, earthy, warm. Mimics the atmosphere of a dimly lit high-end roastery.

admin_theme.description: Clean, high-contrast Swiss style. Optimized for data density.

widget.mobile: Sticky bottom button triggering a Bottom Drawer (Height: 85vh).
widget.pdp_demo: Split layout. Left: Product Image (Sticky). Right: Product Details + Widget trigger.
widget.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside the widget to feel premium.

admin.structure: Sidebar Navigation (Left, Fixed) + Main Content Area (Fluid).
admin.grid: Dense Grid (Mode B). Use grid-cols-12 for analytics views.
admin.card_style: Flat, 1px border (border-slate-200), no shadow or very subtle shadow-sm.

affective_scale_1_9.description: A 9-grid square layout for touch input.
affective_scale_1_9.interaction: Tap to select. Selected state fills the square. Hover effect on desktop.
affective_scale_1_9.visuals: Grid gap-1 or gap-2. Squares should be rounded-sm or rounded-md.

chips.style: Pill shaped. Unselected: Border only. Selected: Filled with Accent/Primary color.

buttons.primary: Solid background (Brand Brown or Accent). Sharp or slightly rounded corners (rounded-md).
buttons.secondary: Outline border. Text color matches border.

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines where possible. Use tooltips for data.
charts.accessibility: Ensure color contrast for data series.

motion.drawer: Slide up from bottom (Spring physics if possible, or cubic-bezier).

textures.description: Dark roasted coffee beans texture. Use for Widget Background or Hero overlay.

context.description: Coffee pot on stove. Warm, artisanal vibe.
Coffee cup on wooden table. Clean and relatable.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Fraunces' font from Google Fonts for headings if possible, otherwise fallback to a nice Serif.
Implement the 1-9 scale as a custom component, do not use a slider.
Ensure the Admin dashboard is high-density and information-rich (Swiss Style).
The Widget must feel 'Dark & Moody' (Earthy Archetype) to contrast with the clean Admin.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.design_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Mix Swiss Grid precision with Organic Coffee textures.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.interaction: Micro-interactions are mandatory. Every tap on the 1-9 scale should feel responsive.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the dark widget background is at least 4.5:1.
